Summary Note:
Rasmussen Sørensen Knudsen and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Copenhagen. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
Rasmussen Sørensen Knudsen is a 55 year old Venture Capitalist from Denmark. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in his decision to join.
Family Background: Rasmussen Sørensen Knudsen is currently divorced. He has 1 kid called Agnes.
Education Background:
Rasmussen obtained his secondary school diploma from Slagelse Gymnasium in 1987.
Rasmussen received his degree from Aarhus University in 1994.
Occupation History:
Rasmussen Sørensen Knudsen is a 55 year old and comes from Denmark.
At Danske Bank A/S, Rasmussen Sørensen Knudsen held the position of Investment Banker from 1993 to 1995, developing essential skills in the field.
At Jyske Bank A/S, he held the position of Private Equity Investor from 1996 to 1998, making significant contributions to the organization.
From 1999 to 2004, he served as a Hedge Fund Manager at Jyske Bank A/S, solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
He appointment as a Venture Capitalist at Jyske Bank A/S in 2005 marked a significant milestone in his career, as he took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 7230000 DKK from his earnings at all companies.
He has townhouse located in Gladsaxe, worth 1096000 DKK.

He purchased townhouse in Frederiksberg, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 1340000 DKK.
Moreover, he has invested in additional property in Roskilde, giving possiblity for generating additional income. The townhouse is valued at 1250000 DKK.

In 2008, he received an inheritance of 18740000 DKK from his late grandmother, who was a prominent Corporate Lawyer, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
